resources.string: Shut Up & Drive! uses GPS to determine when you are driving. If you are driving, Shut Up & Drive! will activate its driving mode features.
While you are driving, Shut Up & Drive! will automatically reply to all of the texts that you receive.
While you are driving, Shut Up & Drive! can block calls from coming through. If you choose not to block calls, incoming callers will be will be read out.
If Shut Up & Drive! is disabled, a text will be sent to a specified number.
GPS is disabled. Shut Up & Drive! requires the GPS to be enabled.
Preferences updated, you may need to restart the app for your updates to take effect
